lstDialogOne: We're lookin for a little kid runnin around the kingdom
His mom is lookin' for him
Big puppy dog eyes, well small..
You haven't happened to have seen him have you? |c
lstOutcomeYesText: Ah hah! Found you! You little git!
Thought you could get away from us?
We'll just take him off your hands for you.
lstOutcomeNoText: If you see him, let us know..
